document.full_text: the second-biggest nuclear power plant in the united states may be down for weeks after killer thunderstorms and tornadoes in alabama knocked out power and automatically shut down the plant, avoiding a nuclear disaster, officials said on thursday.
document.title: alabama nuclear plant shuts safely after tornadoes
lines_and_colors: the second-biggest nuclear power plant in the united states may be down for weeks after killer thunderstorms and tornadoes in alabama knocked out power and automatically shut down the plant, avoiding a nuclear disaster, officials said on thursday.
